operations.bapz: Branch to line c if abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a),  float.epsilon * 8)
operations.bapzal: Branch to line c if abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a),  float.epsilon * 8)
operations.brapz: Relative branch to line c if abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a),  float.epsilon * 8)
operations.bnaz: Branch to line c if abs(a) > max(b * abs(a),  float.epsilon * 8)
operations.bnazal: Branch to line c if abs(a) > max(b * abs(a),  float.epsilon * 8)
operations.brnaz: Relative branch to line c if abs(a) > max(b * abs(a),  float.epsilon * 8)
operations.sapz: Register = 1 if  abs(a) <= max(b * abs(a),  float.epsilon * 8)
operations.snaz: Register = 1 if abs(a) > max(b * abs(a), float.epsilon), otherwise 0
operations.log: Register = base e log(a) or ln(a)

constants.nan: A constant representing 'not a number'. This constants technically provides a 'quiet' NaN, a signal NaN from some instructions will result in an exception and halt execution
constants.pinf: A constant representing a positive infinite value
constants.ninf: A constant representing a negative infinite value
constants.pi: A constant representing the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, provided in double precision
constants.epsilon: A constant representing the smallest value representable in double precision

reagentmodes.Contents: amount of this Reagent present in the machine
reagentmodes.Recipe: amount of this Reagent required by the Machine's current recipe
reagentmodes.Required: amount of this Reagent needed to complete the Machine's current recipe after subtracting the amount currently present

enums.RobotMode.MoveToTarget: Move to target in straight line
enums.RobotMode.Roam: Roam around looking for ores in a 15 co-ors radius
enums.RobotMode.StorageFull: Automaticaly assigned state, shows when storage slots a full
enums.RobotMode.Unload: Unload in chute input of chute bin within 3 meters / 1.5 large grids
